title: Virtueplanet VP Manufacturer Carousel Module (Virtuemart 2) : Jo
description:
VP MFG Carousel
Display The Brands of Your Shop with Professional Touch. Add More Values to Manufacturers.

Give another professional touch to your VirtueMart 2.0 site. Manufacturer or Brands of your site brings a lot values and it is time to use them to generate more revenues out of your business. Let your customers see the brands they know and let them browse products using those brands giving more convenient shopping experience.

Display Manufacturer Images/Logos
Stylish jQyery Based Carousel
Show The Carousel Horizontally or Vertically
Optionally add custom Background Color to the Images
Optionally add custom Border Color to the Images
Optionally add custom Border Radius to the Images
Enable or disable Auto Scroll
Enable or disable Navigation Buttons
Control the Speed for Auto Scrolling
Decide number of images to be shown for Vertical Scroll
Number of images shown for Horizontal scroll decided automatically depending on the available width for the module
Add custom Width and Height to individual images
Can be used on Responsive Template. (If you want to check the responsiveness of the module by re-sizing the size of your browser's window then you will have to refresh/reload the page after re-sizing the window. Number of images shown in Horizontal Scroll calculated based on the window size on page load. It works perfectly if you check it on your mobile devices.)
Images can be linked to Manufacturer's Product Listing Page or to Manufacturer Details Page
Optional Header and Footer Text Area
